games.title: Petal Samurai
games.description: Slash petals with style. Master storm and endless modes.

tooltips.hint: Slice petals as they fall! Follow the tooltip hints for bonus points.
tooltips.modifiers: Unlock slow-mo, double petals, and special blade themes
tooltips.scoring: Perfect slices earn more petals. Build combos for massive scores!

games.title: Memory Match
games.description: Flip cards and match pairs. Perfect recall earns bonuses.

tooltips.hint: Remember card positions! Use modifiers like flipped board for extra challenge.
tooltips.scoring: Petals earned on streaks. Perfect matches give bonus rewards!

games.title: Otaku Beat-Em-Up
games.description: Side-scrolling brawler with JoJo's Bizarre Adventure style. Score multiplier if attacks sync with background beat.

tooltips.hint: Time your attacks to the beat for massive score multipliers!
tooltips.style: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure inspired character designs and poses
tooltips.combos: Chain attacks together for devastating combo moves

games.title: Bubble Girl
games.description: Spawn bubbles, float and score. Sandbox or challenge mode.

tooltips.hint: Bounce on bubbles! Physics-based ragdoll gameplay with airtime scoring.
tooltips.chains: Build combo chains for massive petal rewards
tooltips.modes: Sandbox for creativity or challenge mode for high scores

games.title: Petal Storm Rhythm
games.description: Stormy rhythm playlist—precision timing for petals.

tooltips.hint: Slice petals as laser beams! Beat Saber-style rhythm gameplay.
tooltips.weapons: Unlock different weapons and slicing styles
tooltips.precision: Perfect timing earns more petals and higher scores

games.title: Blossom-ware
games.description: Chaotic micro-sessions—keep your petal streak alive.

tooltips.hint: WarioWare-style microgames! Cute companion explains each challenge.
tooltips.companion: Unique tooltip sequences guide you through each microgame
tooltips.currency: Petals earned as currency for unlocks and upgrades

games.title: Dungeon of Desire
games.description: Descend into the dungeon. Survive rooms and claim rewards.

tooltips.hint: Succubus side-scroller with funny anime/game references!
tooltips.references: Spot the anime and gaming easter eggs throughout

games.title: Thigh Colosseum
games.description: Enter the arena. Win rounds and advance the bracket.

tooltips.hint: Chaotic side-scroller with physics-based crush hazards!
tooltips.physics: Survive against giant thigh-crushers with humor-driven gameplay

games.title: Puzzle Reveal
games.description: Clear the fog to reveal the art. Watch your energy.

tooltips.hint: Image-reveal puzzle game with unlockable difficulty and image packs!
tooltips.energy: Manage your energy as you clear fog to reveal beautiful art
tooltips.packs: Unlock new image packs and difficulty levels with petals
